author: davekpatrick
name: @davekpatrick/action-release-version
description: GitHub Action used to bump the version of a release

scripts.add-metadata: cross-var replace @@NPM_PACKAGE_NAME@@ $npm_package_name dist/index.js && cross-var replace @@NPM_PACKAGE_VERSION@@ $npm_package_version dist/index.js
scripts.build: ncc build index.js --license licenses.txt --out dist && npm run add-metadata
